Hi...
 in this case, I'd just keep a copy of the e-mail I sent, just in case the author shows up one day and says 'Hey, you took my idea!'. (I usually back up all my mails once a month, so I keep track of years exchanged mails.... But I'm a little obsessive about this)
Hope it helps...
Firuze

simple and quick, and avoid misunderstandings.

> Firuze

I just need to clear   up something... What if the author does not 
answer back? What is the SOP   then? 

Sorry for the question.. I'm new at all   this.
